amendment.description: To provide for appropriations for the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Program.

action.text: Amendment SA 2077 proposed by Senator Reed.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2077.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2077 made in Senate.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2077 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 46. Record Vote Number: 261.
Amendment SA 2077 ruled out of order by the chair.
